仄: (そく) - Ser visto de forma tênue, leve, fraca, apagada
仄々: (ほのぼの) - dimly/faintly; (esp. とした) heartwarming
仄めかし: (ほのめかし) - hint; intimation; suggestion; inkling
仄めかす: (ほのめかす) - to hint at; to intimate; to suggest; to allude to; to imply
仄めく: (ほのめく) - to be seen dimly; glimmer
仄仄: (ほのぼの) - dimly/faintly; (esp. とした) heartwarming
仄声: (そくせい) - the three tones of Chinese that exclude the high-level, or first, tone
仄明かり: (ほのあかり) - faint light; dim light
仄聞: (そくぶん) - casually hearing; hearing casually
仆す: (たおす) - (倒す only) to throw down/to bring down/to blow down/to fell/to knock down/to set (something) down on its side/to turn (something) on its side; to kill/to defeat/to beat; (倒す only) to overthrow/to trip up/to ruin; (倒す only) to leave unpaid/to cheat
仆る: (たおる) - (v2r-s,vi)   to fall; to die; to be defeated
仆れる: (たおれる) - (倒れる only)  to fall/to collapse/to drop/to fall senseless; to be forced to bed (by illness, etc.); to die; to go bankrupt/to be ruined/to have a bad debt; to be defeated (in a game); to fall (of governments, dictators, etc.)
仇: (きゅう) - Inimigo, inimigo, adversário, rival; ressentimento, inimizade, rancor; dano, lesão
仇する: (あたする) - to harm/to injure; to oppose
仇となる: (あだとなる) - to backfire; to have a harmful result
仇なす: (あだなす) - to do (someone) a wrong/to do (someone) an ill turn/to take revenge; to resent/to bear a grudge
仇になる: (あだになる) - to backfire; to have a harmful result
仇やおろそか: (あだやおろそか) - making light of; disregarding
仇や疎か: (あだやおろそか) - making light of; disregarding
仇をなす: (あだをなす) - to do (someone) a wrong/to do (someone) an ill turn/to take revenge; to resent/to bear a grudge
仇を取る: (かたきをとる) - to take revenge
仇を成す: (あだをなす) - to do (someone) a wrong/to do (someone) an ill turn/to take revenge; to resent/to bear a grudge
仇を討つ: (あだをうつ) - to avenge (somebody) by striking down their killer
仇成す: (あだなす) - to do (someone) a wrong/to do (someone) an ill turn/to take revenge; to resent/to bear a grudge
仇讎: (きゅうしゅう) - revenge; bitter enemy
今: (kon/kin/ima) - now , now, the present time, just now, soon, immediately, (one) more
今から: (いまから) - hence; from now; from the present moment; from this time forward
今か今か: (いまかいまか) - eagerly waiting; (waiting) impatiently
今が今まで: (いまがいままで) - till just now
今こそ: (いまこそ) - now is the time
今さっき: (いまさっき) - just now; a moment ago
今さら: (いまさら) - now (after such a long time)/at this late hour (i.e. it is too late for something); afresh/anew/again
今さらながら: (いまさらながら) - although at this late hour/now, although it is too late; afresh/anew/again
今しも: (いましも) - just now; right now; at this moment
今すぐ: (いますぐ) - at once; immediately; right now
今だに: (いまだに) - still; even now; until this very day
今でも: (いまでも) - even now; still; as yet
今どき: (いまどき) - present day; today; recently; these days; nowadays; at this hour
今になって: (いまになって) - at this stage; at this point; now (contrasting with the past)
今にも: (いまにも) - at any time; soon
今に始めぬ: (いまにはじめぬ) - nothing new; same as always; nothing new about it
今の今まで: (いまのいままで) - till just now
今の内: (いまのうち) - without delay; at once
今の時代: (いまのじだい) - modern times; the modern age; this day and age
今はこれまで: (いまはこれまで) - unavoidable; this is it; this is the end; left with no choice; it's all over now
今は昔: (いまはむかし) - once upon a time; a long time ago
今は是まで: (いまはこれまで) - unavoidable; this is it; this is the end; left with no choice; it's all over now
今は是迄: (いまはこれまで) - unavoidable; this is it; this is the end; left with no choice; it's all over now
今は此れ迄: (いまはこれまで) - unavoidable; this is it; this is the end; left with no choice; it's all over now
今ひとつ: (いまひとつ) - one more/another/the other; not quite/not very good/lacking
今まで: (いままで) - until now; so far; up to the present
今までで: (いままでで) - (usu. used in superlative clauses together with 一番, 最も, 最悪, etc.) to date; as of now
今までどおり: (いままでどおり) - in the same manner as before; the same as always
今までにも: (いままでにも) - up until now; as recently as the present
今まで通り: (いままでどおり) - in the same manner as before; the same as always
今めかす: (いまめかす) - to modernize; to modernise
今もって: (いまもって) - until now; still; yet; (not) yet; since
今や: (いまや) - now (esp. in contrast to the past); now at last; at present; right now
今わ: (いまわ) - one's dying moment or hour
今わの際: (いまわのきわ) - verge of death; dying moments
今をときめく: (いまをときめく) - at the height of one's power or influence; at the peak of one's popularity
今を去ること: (いまをさること) - dating back from now; ago
今を時めく: (いまをときめく) - at the height of one's power or influence; at the peak of one's popularity
今を生きる: (いまをいきる) - to make the most of the present; to live for the moment; to seize the day
今を盛りと: (いまをさかりと) - in full bloom at the moment
今一: (イマイチ) - one more/another/the other; not quite/not very good/lacking
今一つ: (いまひとつ) - one more/another/the other; not quite/not very good/lacking
今一歩: (いまいっぽ) - one more/another/the other; not quite; close run/just falling short of success
今上天皇: (きんじょうてんのう) - the present Emperor
今上陛下: (きんじょうへいか) - the reigning emperor; His Majesty the Emperor
